sentences.chinese: 吉姆靠給人擦皮鞋爲生。

sentences.english: He reordered two pairs of black leather shoes of the latest type.
sentences.chinese: 他又訂購了兩雙最新式的黑皮鞋。

sentences.english: The rest of us wore rough tweeds and brogues.
sentences.chinese: 粗花呢衣服和鄉下人穿的結實皮鞋。
牛皮鞋底自然燈芯水分。

sentences.english: We are in receipt of your L/C covering 1000 pairs of leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我們已收到你方關於1000雙皮鞋的信用證。

sentences.english: Wait a minute and I'll give my shoes a once-over.
sentences.chinese: 請稍等片刻，我把皮鞋略微擦一擦。

sentences.english: If you want to have your those polished, please put them outside the door.
sentences.chinese: 如果您希望我們幫助您擦皮鞋，請將鞋放在門外。

sentences.english: Which do you want, cloth shoes or leather shoes?
sentences.chinese: 你想要什麼鞋，布鞋還是皮鞋？

sentences.english: They bought many scarf, cotton windcheater and leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 他們買了圍巾，棉風衣和皮鞋。

sentences.english: He tore other strips and bound them about his feet to serve for both moccasins and socks.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他又撕下幾條，裹在腳上，代替鹿皮鞋和襪子。

sentences.english: Don't you need to break in your leather shoes before you take them on your vacation?
sentences.chinese: 在你要穿這皮鞋去度假時，不用先穿穿它們嗎？

sentences.english: Have the soles of your leather shoes lined with rubber to prevent them from wearing down.
sentences.chinese: 皮鞋訂上橡膠底以防止磨損。

sentences.english: The company has an excellent reputation for high-quality leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司因其生產的高質量的皮鞋而享有盛譽。

sentences.english: He makes it seem as if this is one of the most delicious meals that he has ever enjoyed.
sentences.chinese: 他把喫皮鞋的情景表演得像是他喫過的最香的一頓飯。

sentences.english: He shone his leather shoes up till they gleamed.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的皮鞋擦得閃閃發亮。

sentences.english: Mike: They even have special insoles to support the arches of my feet.
sentences.chinese: 皮鞋一般在鞋底回油軟墊，可以支撐腳掌的拱形部位。
